interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: EZ Detangler Brush, Morgles 2 Pack Detangling Brush for Curly Hair Ez Hair Detangling Brush for Afro America/ African Hair 3a to 4c Wavy Hair
Review Date: 2020/12/05
Store: MORGLES
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MORGLES', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Rubber', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Curly,Wavy,Thick', 'Product Dimensions': '9.69 x 2.99 x 1.38 inches; 6.38 Ounces'}
Review Text: Really easy to use brush that is great for all hair types.  My daughter has curly hair and this brush makes it so much easier to brush her hair.  She is more willing to sit for me to brush and style her hair and doesn't complain.  Then she attempts to brush my hair (still developing that skill).
Review Title: Great for tangly hair
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Love this.  Great for nails and those of use who might be a little clumsy and "miss" the opening smearing polish on the light. Works great.  Lots of nails in it's future.
wide opening
Sam&Helen Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit, 5Pairs Magnetic Eyelashes And 2 Tubes Magnetic Eyeliners With Eyelash Applicator-No Glue Needed
Sam&Helen
{'Brand': 'Sam&Helen', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.51 x 5.71 x 0.63 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 5.71 x 0.63 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
I have a few friends who have tried similar products and I was curious.  The liner is thick and has almost a rubbery feel.  Even with makeup remover I found it quite challenging to remove.  Make sure to mix it before applying.  It took me three coats to get the lashes to stay.  Make sure to let it dry all the way.  The lash options are helpful to get the right look.
challenging to remove

Emilia

I really like the smell.  It is easy to add to my daughters bath and she comes out soft and ready for night time.  It leaves her skin soft but not oily and doesn't cause her sensitive skin any trouble.
Relaxing
LAPOTHICELL Blemish Out Cream 50ml, Face Moisturizer, improves uneven skin tone.
LAPOTHICELL
{'Brand': 'LAPOTHICELL', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 2.36 x 2.36 inches; 3.42 Ounces'}
I've fallen in love with a couple Korean beauty products so I was excited to try this one.  It came in a cute little pink box.  The outside of the container was clean.  I have combination skin and I am prone to hormonal breakouts.  Using this twice a day seems to help my blemishes heal faster and not get as bad.  My skin feels very healthy after using this regularly.  I have sensitive skin and have not had any problems.
Great for blemishes

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Preferences:** The user favors modern, straight hairstyles, particularly in bold colors like burgundy and ombre shades, valuing ease of use and a natural look in hair products.

- **Material Preference:** Prefers synthetic hair that mimics human hair quality, especially heat-resistant options.

- **Functional Features:** Appreciates realistic styling attributes such as pre-plucking and baby hair, reflecting a desire for authenticity in beauty products.

- **Review Focus:** The user emphasizes aesthetics, ease of application, and overall product satisfaction, particularly regarding weight and presentation. They have shown a growing interest in beauty tools that enhance convenience and user experience.

- **Recent Interactions:** The user rated a skincare product 5.0 for its effectiveness in healing blemishes, highlighting an appreciation for products that cater to specific skin needs, especially for sensitive and combination skin. They rated a beauty tool 3.0, citing challenges with removal. Most recently, they reviewed a detangling brush, giving it a perfect 5.0 rating for ease of use, especially for curly hair, indicating a focus on user-friendly tools that simplify hair care.

- **Review Trend:** Typically rates products around 4.0 but assigns lower ratings when quality or usability does not meet expectations, demonstrating a strong emphasis on quality and convenience across all beauty applications.

Overall, the user maintains a holistic approach to beauty and skincare, prioritizing style, functionality, and product quality across both hair-related purchases and broader beauty and care products.
